verbose_text: At the doses used neither GDC-0941 nor BKM120 was judged to significantly suppress mTOR activity based on the lack of effect that these compounds had on the phosphorylation of the 4EBP1 at sites phosphorylated by mTORC1 (Thr 37, Thr 46 and Ser 65) (XREF_FIG B).
evidence: phosphorylation of the 4EBP1 at sites phosphorylated by mTORC1
